N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 158.3 - Form of records

State Regulations
(a) No
particular form is required for keeping the records, but such systems of
accounting must be used as will enable the Tax Commission to ascertain whether
liability for New York State income tax is incurred or whether a New York State
information return is required to be filed and, if so, the correctness of the
amounts required to be reported in any New York State income tax return or New

York State information return. (b) See Part 2402 of this Title for taxpayer record retention formats. Notes
